rules_text:
Igna Bellower's power is equal to the number of lands you own in your graveyard or exile.
Vista – Discard a land card: Rejuvenate 2. [i](Activate as a sorcery, instead of playing a land on your turn. Exile two cards from your graveyard, then you may play a permanent card with mana value 2 or less from among them until end of turn.)[/i]
